305.name: The hanged man Joker
305.description: +8 Mult if played hand contains a Pair

306.name: The fool Joker
306.description: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Three of a Kind

307.name: The world Joker
307.description: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair

308.name: The tower Joker
308.description: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Straight

309.name: Strength Joker
309.description: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Flush

310.name: Death Joker
310.description: +50 Chips if played hand contains a Pair

311.name: The moon Joker
311.description: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Three of a Kind

312.name: Judgement Joker
312.description: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Two Pair

313.name: The emperor Joker
313.description: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Straight

314.name: Temperance Joker
314.description: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Flush
